name: Marketing Funnel (GA+SFDC)
description: Combine the power of Google Analytics and Salesforce to see how prospects move through your marketing funnel. Originates from the Gallery.

googleAnalytics.name: GA: Users (Last 30 Days)
googleAnalytics.description: See the number of users who visited your website, rolled up for the past 30 days. Originates from the Gallery.

salesforce-01.name: Leads (Last 30 Days)
salesforce-01.description: See your Salesforce leads from the last 30 days. Originates from the Gallery.

props.SOQLQuery:
SELECT Name
FROM Lead
WHERE CreatedDate = LAST_N_DAYS:30

salesforce-02.name: New Accounts (Last 30 Days)
salesforce-02.description: See all accounts that were created in the last 30 days. Originates from the Gallery.

props.SOQLQuery:
SELECT Name
FROM Account
WHERE CreatedDate = LAST_N_DAYS:30

salesforce-03.name: Opportunities (Last 30 Days)
salesforce-03.description: See all opportunities that were created in the last 30 days. Originates from the Gallery.

props.SOQLQuery:
SELECT Name
FROM Opportunity
WHERE CreatedDate = LAST_N_DAYS:30
